Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires legislative oversight for debt issuances that reach maturity if such maturity exceeds thirty years
Summary: Requires legislative oversight for debt issuances that reach maturity if such maturity exceeds thirty years; provides for the procedure for such debt issuance by the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง386-a, Pub Auth L; amd ยง67-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the state finance law, in relation to requiring legislative oversight of debt issuances with a maturity of more than thirty years; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
